psidev.psi.mi.filemakers.xmlFlattener.mapping
Class TreeMapping

java.lang.Object
  psidev.psi.mi.filemakers.xmlFlattener.mapping.TreeMapping

public class TreeMapping
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used as a Bean to keep all information about the mapping and can be serialized in an XML file.

Author:
Arnaud Ceol, University of Rome "Tor Vergata", Mint group, arnaud@cbm.bio.uniroma2.it

Field Summary
 java.util.HashMap associatedNames
           
 java.lang.String documentURL
           
 java.util.HashMap elementFilters
          this map contains regular expression used to filter XML node if a node do not validate the regexp, itself or its parent element (in case of attribute) will be ignored
 java.util.ArrayList expendChoices
          this hashmap keep trace of choices made by user when expanding the tree.
 java.lang.String lineNode
          the node associated to a line of the flat file. if null, the printer will look for the deeper node that is an ancestor of every selection.

Field Detail

selections

public java.util.ArrayList selections

separator

public java.lang.String separator
the separator for the flat file

associatedNames

public java.util.HashMap associatedNames

lineNode

public java.lang.String lineNode
the node associated to a line of the flat file. if null, the printer will look for the deeper node that is an ancestor of every selection.

schemaURL

public java.lang.String schemaURL

documentURL

public java.lang.String documentURL

expendChoices

public java.util.ArrayList expendChoices
this hashmap keep trace of choices made by user when expanding the tree. It is usefull for example in case of saving/loading . It associate a path (String) to a name.

elementFilters

public java.util.HashMap elementFilters
this map contains regular expression used to filter XML node if a node do not validate the regexp, itself or its parent element (in case of attribute) will be ignored

numerotation_type

public int numerotation_type
